name: AudioMuse AI
overview: AudioMuse-AI Jellyfin Pluging integrates Jellyfin with an AudioMuse AI backend.
description: AudioMuse-AI Jellyfin Plugin integrates Jellyfin with the AudioMuse-AI backend. This plugin works only with the AudioMuse-AI side container, which must be installed separately. After installing both, configure the plugin with the side container's endpoint. Learn more: https://github.com/NeptuneHub/AudioMuse-AI
